scripts.dev: dotenv -e .env -- concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND -c auto "npm run dev -w @hicroft/frontend" "npm run start:dev -w @hicroft/backend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w @hicroft/backend && npm run build -w @hicroft/frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w @hicroft/backend && npm run lint -w @hicroft/frontend
